thread.title_full: This Is The Best Hospital In California For 2025 | ALT 98.7

author: Logan DeLoye
title: This Is The Best Hospital In California For 2025 | ALT 98.7
text:
Beloved California Medical Center Crowned State's 'Best Hospital' For 2025 By Logan DeLoye
November 7, 2024
Photo: Moment RF Being conveniently located to one of the best medical facilities in the country is a huge factor that drives people to move to a certain area.
Proximity to a hospital with great ratings provides peace of mind should one ever find themselves in need of top-notch medical care.
While there are a handful of California hospitals named among the best in the U.S., one is raked higher than all the rest.
According to a list compiled by Newsweek , the best hospital in California for 2025 is Stanford Health Care - Stanford Hospital located in Stanford.
UCLA Health - Ronald Reagan Medical Center in Los Angeles, UCSF Medical Center in San Francisco, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, Jacobs Medical Center at UC San Diego Health in San Diego, Keck Hospital of USC in Los Angeles, Scripps Memorial Hospital La Jolla in La Jolla, and UCLA Health - Santa Monica Medical Center in Santa Monica also ranked among the absolute best hospitals in California.
Here's what Newsweek had to say about compiling the data to discover the best hospitals across the country for the coming year:
"This year's rankings include facilities in all 50 states and the District of Columbia. The rankings were compiled using quality metrics from the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) and the AHA Annual Survey of Hospitals Database, a nationwide online survey among medical professionals, results from HCAHPS patient experience surveys and a voluntary PROMs (Patient-Reported Outcome Measures) implementation survey." For a continued list of the best hospitals across America (and California specifically) check out Newsweek 's full report.

organizations.name: UCLA Health - Santa Monica Medical Center
